metadata.title: CVE-2021-46965 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  mtd: physmap: physmap-bt1-rom: Fix unintentional stack access  Cast &data to (char *) in order to avoid unintentionally accessing the stack.  Notice that data is of type u32, so any increment to &data will be in the order of 4-byte chunks, and this piece of code is actually intended to be a byte offset.  Addresses-Coverity-ID: 1497765 ("Out-of-bounds access")
